website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy style for those who don't mind doing a little extra work.
pros: Stylish, wobble-free design is built with straightforward assembly and extra hardware that makes it easy to place
Wood that can be painted or stained for a totally customized look
cons: The unsealed wood requires some extra DIY to perfect this piece

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and durable finish in wet environment
customer_reviews.text: I put this bench in our steam shower as a cheap alternative to a teak bench. I did not expect it to last long in the host, steamy environment of a steam shower (essentially a wet sauna, steam room). However, the finish looks great after 1.5 years of almost daily steam shower use. It shows a little fading but still looks great. There is no staining from corrosion from the hardware. The only thing I can't attest to is how this bench would stand up to daily UV (i.e. outside). Otherwise, it is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: July2017 I bought for my yoga studio entry. The bench is well made and sanded to perfect smoothness. The bolts do not show like cheap benches. It is more of a zen look for a living room, patio, or bathroom. You would need to stain it darker or finish to not look tacky at a dining table. I love that it is American made and sustainable wood. All of the seams and joints have no issues. The bad reviews seem to be from years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Floridayogi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The size was perfect, the price was right, but I wasn't sure about the color. I really wanted darker, richer tones and I noticed someone in previous reviews mentioned theirs arrived darker than the picture. So I took a chance, ready to stain darker if need be. But it arrived somewhat darker and richer looking and with some teak oil, it's just beautiful on the front porch with a red pillow. It was easy to put together, is lightweight, but is also solid and stable. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for around your pool or patio!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted benches for the narrow areas by the swimming pool. I thought for the price these would last a season or two. I was really impressed with how sturdy and comfrotable these are. The look great too. My husband put them togather in about 5 minutes and he even commented how sturdy and well made they are . I am going to order 2 more.They are perfect for half the price of all the other ones I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Gilly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bench!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! I use it on my patio covered with potted plants. It sits just under the level of the windows, allowing the plants to be visible from the inside. I was impressed with the quality of the bench and its finish. It was easy to put together, and it has stood up to outside weather conditions admirably. This spring I gave it a light sanding to remove any accumulated stains, oiled it, and put it right back into service. (By the way, it's great to sit on, too!)
customer_reviews.author: RaleighReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is beautiful. Using it as a coffee table for now, but when we find the right coffee table for the room it's in, there is a perfect spot in the garden for it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Dumont

customer_reviews.title: Great buy: well made, easy to assemble and perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something for our front porch, but we don't use the porch for sitting/relaxing and I didn't want to get chairs that will just sit there for "decorative" purposes like so many people do. This bench was a perfect size, very well made, comfortable (for minimal sitting), and very easy to assemble. (Took me 10 minutes, tops.) I was even impressed with the care in the packaging. (Bolts were protected by cylindrical rubber covers.) Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AGinNC

customer_reviews.title: Wow What A Fantastic Bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench was so easy and quick to put together...I'm totally amazed. I have difficulty with my hands and was worried I would have to wait for someone to assemble it. Not to worry I put on some rubber gloves used the little wrench that comes with the bench kit and was done in 20 min. I need no help at all. The wood is quite lite and was easy to carry to me back patio. Now I'm ready for summer. Thanks Achla Designs. Love this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our entryway
customer_reviews.text: We just received this bench today and my husband put it together pretty quickly. It was well packaged and they even sent backup hardware. It's the perfect size and shape for our small entryway, and it appears to be well made. We really like it so far, and since we plan to leave it outside in a somewhat protected area i will update in a year (if I remember to lol) as to its durability. Very nice bench!
customer_reviews.author: Zuberdeen

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. Trying to improve my backyard and this looks so nice in the space that I ordered another one. It arrived in a timely manner and so simple to build; it took less than 10 minutes to put together (I hate building things and I could’ve done this blindfolded). It’s smooth and sturdy too. Appreciate the packaging too - all recyclable cardboard and very little plastic, no foam.
customer_reviews.author: JSL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 benches. Arrived very quickly and assembly was a breeze. My husband thinks we will have to seal them but they are beautiful and comfortable. I was going to build benches but couldn't build a bench for what this costs.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Your best buy! Especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is gorgeous! Perfect size, height, sturdiness. I sprayed it with teak oil and it is stunning. I put it on my front porch and I absolutely love it. Easy to assemble! Cannot beat the price. Buy this one -you won't regret it. Don't think something more expensive is needed. I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly STURDY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bench in a medium brown color. I can attest to its extreme sturdiness because I had 350 lb guest over and he sat on it and there was no issue. That’s about the best test it could have. It’s attractive and well made. There is room to put good sized wicker baskets under the seat fit more storage. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bench. Made of Eucalyptus tree. It is stained nicely and very sturdy. Well packed in the box for shipment without damage. Incredibly easy to assemble and as a bonus they included a spare nut and two washers. PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Clear plastic bolt protectors? Really necessary?
customer_reviews.text: Whoever decided the bolts needed clear plastic protective covers on them should be shot. They are almost impossible to remove in order to install the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave N

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: It's been 2 years since I purchased this bench for a commercial application. We have it in our locker room at work and it's been used every day. I'm just about to buy another and thought I'd write a review since it's been such a good buy. It's held up, still looks great and you just can't go wrong, especially with the pricing.
customer_reviews.author: OtisPaul

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench!
customer_reviews.text: We are a no-shoes in the house family, and purchased this to put in the car port, adjacent to the kitchen entryway as a spot to sit and put shoes off/on. It's sturdy, and easily accommodates both my husband and I at the same time; solid wood, modern/neutral design goes with nearly any home aesthetic; quality parts and it was very easy to assemble (comes with it's own bolt key). Definitely recommend. Quality at a fair price. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Thorsten K.

customer_reviews.title: Really great looking bench!
customer_reviews.text: These look fantastic! They’re easy to put together and are perfect for my patio. From the price I paid I honestly was worried they’d look cheap or be really wobbly....they’re neither! I think you really get a great bench for the money! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: amazonamy

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I think the fishing is already coming off and the wood is cracked. It was a Mother’s Day gift for my mom so there was not time to exchange it but kind of Wish I did. It’s good but not great. I wish the QC department was a bit better for the cost of this item.
customer_reviews.author: deltauman

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: What's not apparent in the photos is the top of this bench has a slight concave shape to it. I would have preferred if it was flat. I am using it as an accent bench and nobody will ever sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Davis

customer_reviews.title: Coating from factory doesn't stand up to weather
customer_reviews.text: OK product for the price, but the coating applied at the factory is falling off and pealing after only 3 months of being out in the weather.
customer_reviews.author: BIll

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bench arrived quickly and in good condition. It was very easy to assemble and looks terrific. Its rare to find a perfectly well made and truly simple to put together product. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Teachman

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! It fits perfectly under a standard double window and really adds accent to our dining room. The color was a bit darker than the picture, but I actually love it even more than what I was planning for. This would be perfect for putting plants or whatever on as a stand or simply leave it empty and use as a bench. It is also excellent quality wood and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Raylene Bates

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: It's quite good. I bought 5 on sale, but even at full price it's a good value. If there was a 5' version that would be good. Also, a primered version would be good for those that want to paint it.
customer_reviews.author: TheCeladon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Sturdy, Handsome Bench!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. It looks great and was EXTREMELY easy to assemble. It came very well packaged-in fact, removing the packaging on the screws was the most challenging step of assembly! Don’t spend a fortune on teak...this eucalyptus wood bench is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: MHdez

customer_reviews.title: I used this bench to create a patio mud room
customer_reviews.text: My back entry into the laundry room was too small to make a mud area for rain coats, boots, etc. So I hung hooks, placed this bench beside the back door (on my covered patio). The bench comes in handy when I am carrying in groceries too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for shower- brown leached off and stained grout :((
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a seat for our garage that we could sit on to put on our tennis shoes. We also keep the shoes underneath. It is just the perfect height and length and looks great. Assemble was extremely simple and they even included an extra nut and bolt. The finish was smooth and the stain a nice medium brown color. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Minamint

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: This bench was easy to put together - just attached the legs. It is study and is serving as a sit down spot in our mud room. The wood color is really pretty. If I needed another one, I would not hesitate to buy this bench again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca St Croix Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Comfort + Beauty = Joy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Curved Seat is very comfortable, Wood is durable and perfect for its use in an outdoor enclosed Shower. It is part of the “style” of the screened enclosure!
customer_reviews.author: Peter543

customer_reviews.title: Too nice for Exterior
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bench. All parts were there, we only had to attach the legs. I do wonder if finish will hold up outside. It was bought for exterior use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leary

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Love the benches as I bought 2 of them for my front porch. They look so nice with potted plants and they provide a great place to sit. I have only had them a couple of weeks so will hope they do well this winter.
customer_reviews.author: BettyBoop

customer_reviews.title: Classic and beautiful design!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench! I’d like to purchase another just like it ! 😃 Looks great after more than a year on my patio in all kinds of weather
customer_reviews.author: Plain Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bench for a great price. It was very easy to assemble, is very sturdy, and comfortable. At least we think it’s comfortable as our Maine Coon cat can usually be found stretched out on it. I guess he thinks we got it for him!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Pool side bench
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three of these for around the pool. Nice cedar look, seems well-made and sturdy. Easy assembly. Happy with purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Hole for Charger too Small
customer_reviews.text: Although the case is nice looking and sturdy, the hole for the charger is too small. I have to remove the phone from the case every time I need to charge it. If I don'd, there is no connection and the phone does not charge. This is extremely inconvenient and impractical. Until they change the design, I WOULD NOT recommend this case to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Scafidi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Look more expensive than they are. Easy to paint to match your decor. I will prob deal it with a sealer because they are on my deck. Bought two! They arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Nice benches, great price, well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and sturdy, and really inexpensive. I'm redecorating and these are perfect for in between :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Backless Bench
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy quality bench. Durable, comfortable practical, esthetic design. Vesatile uses. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Brindles Fey

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So I impressed with the quality of this bench, far better than expected for the price...bought two! Very precision made, excellent finish, high quality fittings! So very pleased!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Tsutsumida

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and so useful
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bench for putting our spices - allows me to prune without bending all the way down. And super easy to assemble. It also looks very fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessieg

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Bench
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bench so much I bought 3 of them for a men's public restroom. They are sturdy, well made and hold up to alot of traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Gorgeous Little Greek Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but low
customer_reviews.text: Only use the tool they give you to tighten the nuts. Haven't had it long enough to know of its durability but it is very comfortable. Maybe a little low.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Walch

customer_reviews.title: Made in Indonesia.
customer_reviews.text: Previous reviewers and sellers have incorrectly stated that this item is made in the USA. The item is clearly labeled "Made in Indonesia" (see photo.) However this is a quality bench that was very easy to assemble. It looks great and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Walter

customer_reviews.title: But two
customer_reviews.text: Bummed I didn’t order two, super nice and handles the water well
customer_reviews.author: cJems

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. It fits perfectly in my shower. Great addition to the new house.
customer_reviews.author: thesmiffs

customer_reviews.title: ... second bench i have purchased from Amazon because i liked the first one so well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bench i have purchased from Amazon because i liked the first one so well. i am currently using them at my dining room table instead of the 6-8 chairs (that need to be repaired.) i'm not sure that i will replace the benches in the future. They are great! And they look great, too. i threw some bench cushions on them and i couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Zen
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful simple design, sturdy, comfortable and easy to assemble! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortable to sit on
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bench! Super sturdy- my husband was very surprised when it put it together at how nicely it’s made. We have it sitting outside on our back deck for the summer and will bring it inside to use this winter.
customer_reviews.author: S L Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The dip in the middle of the bench makes it comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Tony Arrieta

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. However, I have not been able to find a seat pad for that size. It's not that important.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Looks great at the foot of my bed. Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: GinetteC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench easy to assemble and an excellent value for the price. Looks great on my front porch!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi E.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the benches. I have plants on them so not sure how comfy they are but they look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: JenLG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Next to the Hot-Tub
customer_reviews.text: People sit on ours after getting out of the Jacuzzi. Weathers nicely. Comfortable. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This bench is in our entry hall and is used for us to put on our shoes before going out the door. It is beautiful, functional and a good price. There is a slight curve to the seat making it more comfortable. I highly recommend it for its quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Moving On

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: This bench came quickly and is really great! Easy to put together, very sturdy and attractive. It's also extremely comfortable with a dip in the middle of the seat. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bookmuse

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Assemble Sturdy Bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is not only Beautiful it is very easy to assemble. All the hardware is hidden so no nuts are bolts can be seen unless you turn the bench upside down. This is one of the best pieces of furniture that I ever received online. The bench is lightweight and sturdy. I just received the bench and it took only 2 minutes to assemble. looks like it will last but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great poolside!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! Purchased to be placed by our in-ground pool for seating. Looks great. We treated it with Minwax Teak oil before we put it out. It's only been a week so we can't comment on the wear. But the bench looks nice and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bench and is perfect for my new front porch, but when it arrived, the color is not the same as it is represented in the picture. It is not light honey oak, it is a dull dark brown. I sanded it, stained it, and polyurethaned it, and now it looks a little closer to the color represented in the picture. Besides the color of the bench, it is a sturdy bench.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M. Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than I expected for the price. Good quality, very comfortable, and looks fabulous on my patio. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: happy in ann arbor

customer_reviews.title: Great Yard Bench
customer_reviews.text: Quality and was easy to put together! We are very happy with this bench. It added a nice touch of class and is very well made. Very happy with the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! This bench is beautifully designed, easy to assemble, sturdy and quite elegant. I am amazed at the thoughtfulness put into the packaging, instructions, and hardware. Took me all of 10 minutes to put it together. I am absolutely delighted and will purchase two more for a couple other areas in our condominium clubhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. So far sturdy and has held up against to 4-year-old grandsons who prefer to eat off it like a table because it is the right height when using their fold director's chairs to sit on. Held up in rain and wind storm which popped up unexpectedly. Pricing was excellent and shipped without any damage. Again love that prime as shipping was free!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: LIked the solid feel, arrived quickly. Finish is a bit rough but works in the guest room at the foot of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bench is well built with strong hardware in leg-to-seat assembly. Very sturdy. I chose to buy a set of sliders for the feet; I chose to spray the bench with a topcoat of clear urethane (will be indoor use) to give it a better finish durability. If for outdoor use, check the label first before you use a urethane product, as some have poor UV protection, will become badly discolored.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R Lowery

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: This bench went together very easily and is very sturdy. It’s perfect for my back deck.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Working great as luggage racks
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased two of these simple benches to serve as luggage racks in our guest bedrooms. They fill the bill perfectly, and as a bonus we can take them out to our deck for extra seating. They're well made and simple to put together -- fully assembled except for the legs. They're made of sustainable hardwood and are splinter-free. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ljm1967

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: As expected. To answer someone's question -- there is miiiiinimal concavity to the seat but I use it as a plant stand and the flower pots do not wobble so it is totally negligeble. Very good quality, fast delivery, easy assembly. I use it indoors only.
customer_reviews.author: kapi

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I have by my front door. I love sitting on it when I am watching my dogs in the front yard. It is very comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the quality here. Legs easy to attach. Small width a plus for smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nic bench
customer_reviews.text: Cute little benches for,the side of our fire pit. We’re happy
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Mullan

customer_reviews.title: Good bench but Bleeds Factory Applied Oil or Stain
customer_reviews.text: The bench stained the deck. We were able to get the stain out. The workmanship is good. We intend to stain the benches with a proper weather proof stain which should alleviate the bleeding problem.
customer_reviews.author: NPO-KatyTX

customer_reviews.title: Good Start for a Dining/Entryway bench.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for a long entree wall. It is darker than pictures. I had the legs tapered and I'm in the process of sanding the benches. Will restain them and clear gloss so they actually work as a pieces of furniture for a fraction of a finished dining/entry bench.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: We have this near our front door near our rose garden. Get lots of complements. Nice and comfortable. Was very easy to put together. Very impressed with this bench. Well crafted and sturdy. Looks so nice after touching up with teak oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and level, and it took my husband about 5 seconds to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: We are extremely pleased with both purchases
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing the small side table and seeing the quality, we also bought this as a patio coffee table. We are extremely pleased with both purchases. This piece was also very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn/Rick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product with well thought out assembly instructions and environmental packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Spiliotis

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully thought out product
customer_reviews.text: Received this product in CA in five days. Came from company in Michigan but do not know if the bench is made there or somewhere else (China?) Regardless, it came carefully boxed and I put the bench together in 15 minutes. The supplier even included the necessary wrench. It's real wood and not a laminate and fits together easily and well. Beautifully machined and thought out and already treated for outdoor weather. Couldn't be happier and would recommend this bench to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie517

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bench!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty stool. A dark cinnamon color. A little off balance so I had to as supports onto one of the legs so it doesn't wobble. Otherwise great quality and easy to attach the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Maria H.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This bench arrived in perfect condition. It took my husband 10 minutes to put together and it looks absolutely beautiful and sturdy. I am very very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great teak bench for the price. Make sure you seal it if you put it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, Easy to Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for, not to big...4feet long. Aloha
customer_reviews.author: Censei

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the material and the craftsmanship! This is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: s.o.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small bench for my little deck and this fit great. Very sturdy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissythewolff

customer_reviews.title: More than worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This bench went together quickly and easily, 30 minutes or less. The wood is very nice looking and is a rich looking color. While you don't have to finish it, I did get teak oil and finished it immediately. It probably could have used a very light sanding with a very fine grade of sand paper in some areas as well but I did not stop to do that but will next time I apply teak oil. Applying the teak oil made it look all the better. I would definitely purchase other products from this seller based on the quality of this bench and the buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Top Cat

customer_reviews.title: very happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bench arrived this evening and I had it assembled in 15 mins. It really looks nice, and is solidly constructed. Only the legs needed to be attached, and all the hardware was included - even a tiny wrench, and an extra set of washers/bolt. I feel like I got a real bargain!
customer_reviews.author: DRD

customer_reviews.title: 5 Minute Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than expected. Perfect for outside my front door. Came with the bolts to attach the legs and a small wrench. Five minute assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: weatherproof bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, quality built bench, easy to screw together and is comfortable to sit on. It sets in a garden patio and gets rained on alot but dries quickly. It looks really nice and could be used inside as well. I got the teak oil and rubbed it in which helps with repeling the rain.
customer_reviews.author: JOEY

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy build and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Bought four of them. Sturdy and easy to assemble. Packaging box is flimsily and, although the the contents were securely packed, a careless shipper could damage the product easily.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench to sit underneath a mirror in a hallway. It is perfect and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Borcherdt

customer_reviews.title: Great wood modern bench!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! It looks great and easy to assemble. I hesitated on buying this bench because the seat has a curve and I wanted very modern straight lines. It was the exact size I needed, so I ordered it anyway. I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: urban tequila

customer_reviews.title: Decent construction and looks good next to the pool
customer_reviews.text: The benches ( I bought 2), arrived in good order, but were really dirty and poorly finished within the boxes. A little elbow grease, some steel wool and generous amounts of teak oil have made them just what I wanted around the spa.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Heart

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in our shower. Put a coat of teak oil on it first. It has been nearly a year and it doesn't show any wear at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Mc Gee

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price! I Purchased these for a commercial installation.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lechthaler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product ...... I painted it white ... works well for Dining corner table -- thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Foglesong

customer_reviews.title: Backless Bench
customer_reviews.text: We wanted this bench for inside use. Nicely designed and perfect for the purpose that we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it would cost a lot more.
customer_reviews.text: We will be using our bench in an outdoor shower area
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice outdoor bench
customer_reviews.text: This wood bench is really nice. Easy to put together, solid construction, great finish. I did put some teak oil on it before placing it outside. We have it sitting outside outside of our front door porch. We are thinking of getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHI

customer_reviews.title: This is a lovely, low table that fits below ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely, low table that fits below some of my 6 foot tall windows that crank open in my sunroom. I put potted plants on it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet G

product_meta.title: Achla Designs Backless Bench, 4-Foot - OFB-08
product_meta.description: Color:NaturalThe 4' Backless Bench in Natural Oil finish is our simplest and best-selling design. Both utilitarian and attractive, it is sturdy with a comfortable slatted seat. For the garden, patio, porch, or indoors, it makes a great resting spot, boot bench or even a side table. All of our wood benches are made of eco-friendly sustainably harvested Eucalyptus Grandis wood. To ensure the long life of unpainted furniture, reapply oil as needed to preserve the color and finish of the wood. We also recommend bringing wood furniture indoors or storing under a waterproof cover during extreme weather months.here is our 4' backless bench which measures 48-inch w by 15 3/4-inch d by 17-inch h; oil finish
feature_bullets: Knocked down for compact shipping and easy assembly
Knocked down for compact shipping and easy assembly
